divs: Sighting DetailsI was visiting Madonna's website and watching a video of her performing "Give It To Me" at an outdoor concert in St. Petersburg, Russia, on Aug. 2, 2009. At the beginning of the video, you can tell from one of the shots that the sun has set and it's almost completely dark. When the video hits the 1 minute 38 second mark, the camera suddenly pans away from the stage (did the camera man see them?) and is pointed to the horizon where there are 8 orbs hanging in the sky (too high and still to be camera flashes coming from the crowd), and if you watch closely you'll see 2 more orbs come from the middle of the screen and cross the other orbs at record speed in a right to left direction. Interestingly, a few months ago, I found a video on YouTube showing a bright orb watching a concert given in mid-day (I think it was Springsteen performing). So, Madonna 8 orbs and Springsteen 1 orb. I guess they showed up to watch the hardest working earth-woman in showbusiness.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in St Petersburg
There were no other sightings in St Petersburg on or around August 2nd 2009
